Employee Frequently Asked Questions Receive EDP updates by e-mail Send us feedback on the program Food&Restaurants
Disclaimer
The University of Texas at Austin Human Resources Services has approved all the listed vendors to participate in the Employee Discount Program. It is the vendor's responsibility to maintain their discount offers and to check the university status of a potential customer. The University of Texas at Austin is not responsible for issues between vendors and customers. 89 discounts offered by 88 vendors in this category
